input.sentences: everyone gathered for the tavern 's halloween party .
there was a mountie and a nurse .
there was also a race of pig people .
and last but not least | these two . we do n't know exactly what they were | but they were the life of the party .
output.sentences: We went to a Halloween party where there was a man sitting in a chair with paper attached to him
Next we'd seen a woman dressed as a nurse and another woman dressed as a progressive car insurance worker
We then found a quartet of people where two were dressed as pigs and the other two dressed as attorneys
After that we took pictures of people who were dressed as pirates
Finally, we took pictures of two old ladies posing next to each other
